description: This file defines the DatabaseOptions class which represents configuration settings for the database connection in a .NET application. It includes properties for the database provider and connection string, with default values and documentation comments explaining their usage.

classes.name: DatabaseOptions
classes.description: A class that encapsulates database configuration options such as provider and connection string, which can be set via environment variables or appsettings.

methods.name: DatabaseOptions
methods.description: Default constructor initializing Provider to 'Sqlite' and ConnectionString to 'Data Source=notes.db'.
